TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PrintDialog extends System.Object

summary.span: 调用标准的 Microsoft Windows 打印对话框，此对话框可根据用户输入配置 和 ，然后打印文档。

span.span: Invokes a standard Microsoft Windows print dialog box that configures a and according to user input and then prints a document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户可以使用 " **打印** " 对话框选择打印机，对其进行配置，然后执行打印作业。A user can use the **Print** dialog box to select a printer, configure it, and perform a print job. 严格地说，您可以使用 方法，而不必打开对话框。Strictly speaking, you can use the method without ever opening the dialog. 在这种意义上，控件可用作不可见的打印组件。In that sense, the control can be used as an unseen printing component. 但出于性能原因，最好是使用方法，或者使用的 多个 和 方法之一 。But for performance reasons, it would be better to use either the method or one of the many and methods of the . 有关详细信息，请参阅 [如何：以编程方式打印 XPS 文件](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-programmatically-print-xps-files)。For more about this, see [How to: Programmatically Print XPS Files](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-programmatically-print-xps-files). 不要将此类 与进行混淆 。Do not confuse this class, , with . 后者用于 Windows 窗体应用程序。The latter is used with Windows Forms applications. 用于 Windows Presentation Foundation 应用程序。 is used with Windows Presentation Foundation applications. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何 使用标记和代码创建的实例并显示简单的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 。The following example shows how to create an instance of and display a simple by using [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] markup and code. [!code-xaml[PrintDialog#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PrintDialog/CSharp/Window1.xaml#2)] ...... [!code-csharp[PrintDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PrintDialog/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#1)] [!code-vb[PrintDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PrintDialog/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置页范围内允许的最大页码。

span.span: Gets or sets the highest page number that is allowed in page ranges.

value.span: ，它表示可在 "**打印**" 对话框中的页范围内使用的最高页码。

span.span: A that represents the highest page number that can be used in a page range in the **Print** dialog box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 "**打印**" 对话框设置为在由和值设置的范围之外打印页面时，单击 "**打印**" 的用户 将收到一条错误消息，告知其最大和最小页码。Users who click **Print** when the **Print** dialog box is set to print pages outside the range that is set by the and values will get an error message advising them of the maximum and minimum page numbers. 不会打印任何内容。Nothing will be printed.

span.span: The property is being set to less than 1.
